attributes.action: Increase measure to ensure that housing association/council housing is given to people who need it rather than the people who believe they shouldnt have to get a job and earn their own money.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see more housing given to young families and homeless who are willing to work as much as possible and contribute to society rather than people who simply cannot bring themselves to work  through a self-centred belief that they shouldnt have to when others will pay, and people who believe having kids is a ticket to a free home and income.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
